title: Provided that, for the construction of new railway lines or tracks the approval of the State Government shall be necessary
clause_text: Provided that, for the construction of new railway lines or tracks the approval of the State Government shall be necessary. For construction of new buildings, goods stores, sheds or platforms, parcel offices and workshops or for purposes of major remodeling, the approval of the Commissioner shall be necessary.
